website_summaries.verdict: Straps and buckles are easy to adjust quickly. Excellent quality in a harness at a decent price.
pros: You can put on this harness quickly and make adjustments on the fly
More comfortable to wear than full body harnesses
Simple style of harness doesn't offer high-end extras, so it's easy to use
Hunters love the harness for use in a tree stand because of comfort
cons: Won't fit well on some people with small bodies, so measure carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter harness but has its faults
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starter harness..but do yourself a favor and get a more quality harness if you're a regular. My gym uses these for their 'rent' gear..but the leg straps will dig into your thighs after a couple climbs. Unless you wear thick pants/shorts, you're not going to have a good time ;) I now own a Petzl harness with though pads. It's a good harness but girl..you can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Zach McQueary

customer_reviews.title: Nice for My Intended Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while hunting off climbing stand. Lots of hunters are going this route and personally I think it's safer and more comfy than the full body harnesses. There are you tube videos showing and explaining why. This harness works great. It's wasy to put on and if you do fall you are in a sitting position not hanging like a puppet on a string.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Nice hunting safety harness
customer_reviews.text: Nice climbing harness. I use it hunting in a tree stand, it allows me to add or shed clothing layers without having to unhook a full body harnesswhile 30 ft up in a tree, which would be very foolish.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a tree stand safety harness, much better than the ones for hunting. Lighter, simpler, and packs easier. I've used it to hang in and look around the tree, it's very comfortable. Get this, the Melotius PAS 22 personal anchor system, a locking carabineer, and a rope style tree strap with prussic knot and you're set.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Garland

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. My proportions are not average for a climber and this adapted perfectly for me. I've been a sprinting athlete my whole life and other harnesses would not fit around my thighs at all. Can also be used by anyone else in the family. I use it for tree stands and love the adjustable nature of it. For a more average build it could give the option of going over winter gear and also fit great in warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!!
customer_reviews.text: Great harness !!This is the second one I've bought thanks for a great product I feel safe having this on my daughter and her friends while riding on our zipline which is 30' up in the trees. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for hunting from a treestand and I've never been more comfortable! This harness NEVER gets in the way and I have a TON more room to move when I need to. I also feel more protected in this and feel that it's much better designed than those full-body hunting harness'.
customer_reviews.author: Outbreak

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy, but cuts off circulation
customer_reviews.text: I like the safety and sturdiness, and the adjustments fit any conceivable size person (who would want a zipline ride). But the leg straps tend to cut off circulation after only a few minutes. All my zipline riders complained of numb legs - - not a good thing. Use it within these limits and it's five stars.
customer_reviews.author: G3

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with harness .Well made , shipped fast , and got for very fair price . And saved a lot of time ,having to run around to find and buy.
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother, and he really enjoys it. We looked at a couple other rappelling harnesses that were much more expensive and this item is very comparable. It holds the same weight and is designed very nicely for a safe, snug, and comfortable fit. The colors are very stylish and bright, so you will look great flying down that mountain side!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: terrific product. Heavy duty and safe
customer_reviews.text: Only one issue...no extra hooks for stashing belay device etc. when not in use. Other than that...terrific product. Heavy duty and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: it fits me fine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hunting, climbing trees, and for safety while in a tree stand. It works as expected. I can not give it five stars because I have nothing to compare it to, this is my first rock climbing harness. I am 6'2" 170 lbs. it fits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Well made harness
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our 16 year old son who does gym climbing. The harness appears well made and is adjustable so it will continue to accommodate my son (who is very thin) as he continues to grow.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: excelente arnes
customer_reviews.text: excellent harness is very comfortable and fast to register, is an excellent harness for use when climbing gyms for working with students, I will use it to work with the public with artificial climbing walls, is for all sizes, very good harness I recommend it, the seller is an excellent person and responsible for doing business
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend them for mobile rock climbing walls
customer_reviews.text: We own a mobile rock climbing wall to rent out for events and these harnesses are great, we do events that have over 200 kids and it's very fast and easy to take them off and on ! We had ordered 4 of them 2 months ago and we just ordered 2 more. Very happy about this product. Only downside there not that comfortable but they do the job for wearing them for only a few mins .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great one size fits all!
customer_reviews.text: Some nylon starting to fray after months of heavy use. Very good for a cheap harness. So glad it fits everyone. Bought another smaller one at REI and it is better quality, but limited use since it does not have the range this one has. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Swadick

customer_reviews.title: It's great for belaying however it's not very comfortable when you're ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great for belaying however it's not very comfortable when you're hanging. If your goal is just cheap belt that will do the job, then it works great, however it lacks comfort.
customer_reviews.author: New Century Home Decor

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for Tree Stand Safety
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it for fall protection in my deer stands. Its very light, manuverable, and more comfortable than my full body harness.
customer_reviews.author: David Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because the gym we go to does not let us belay someone with it since it does not have a dedicated belay loop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable, thoroughly adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly adjustable although the waistband is not padded as much as I would like. All of our kids can fit it on though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lang

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail, put on my biggest thickest pants still slides over them very easily, for right and is comfortable, I'm 270 and 6' 1" don't have a problem with the harness at all, recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This could be the perfect safety harness for the treestand hunter
customer_reviews.text: This could be the perfect safety harness for the treestand hunter. I will not go back to a traditional hunting harness after using this one.
customer_reviews.author: New Day Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: fits great for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: We put a zip line up in our backyard and this harness is great for it. It's comfortable to sit in and very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Use this for hunting instead of the traditional harness' in th ehunting industry
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome harness. I use this for a safety harness when hunting from a tree.
customer_reviews.author: david prentice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent price on time seems acceptable, very well packaged it is acceptable, I worked excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Padilla Mora

customer_reviews.title: buy durable appears that just is not very comfortable, I use the same
customer_reviews.text: buy durable appears that just is not very comfortable, I use the same, without any problems, if you seek strength buy it but if not look for better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: sandro ernesto espinoza genes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice price very good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for facilitating or taking a ride on the zip line. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for the kids to rappel and swing on long ropes.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: decent loaner harness
customer_reviews.text: We use this to take friends climbing. It's wide adjustability fits everyone decently though it isn't a harness they'll want to hangdog in.
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. It is strong and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: robfra611

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints Here
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit! Nice color and works great when belaying and getting belayed.
customer_reviews.author: Nyan

customer_reviews.title: Zipline harness
customer_reviews.text: Extra good zipline harness. Well worth the money. Fits up to size 42" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and easy to put on, love it . I do indoor rock climbing and I'm 5'1" and 160 pounds , great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Paula Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This was the first time I have purchased a harness ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I have purchased a harness so I am not an experienced climber or one who often repels. I am though a 43 year old who knows quality when I see it. This product is just that, quality. To purchase a product online that literally has my life in it's hands is a bit of a gamble but I won the bet. I have used the harness and everything about it is sound. Black Diamond clearly knows what they are doing. From the material quality to the fit, all is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: JWagner

customer_reviews.title: I actually really like this harness
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this harness. It is the rental harness at my climbing gym. I thought I would order one for myself for my first outdoor climbing adventure, but when it arrived, it was a completely different harness in the package. And of course, it was the day before my trip. Needless to say, I didn't end up with this harness, but I did get a full refund, including shipping. And as for the actual product, though I ended up buying another in a store near our climbing spot, I still think the vario is a great one size fits all harness.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Right price, right comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have done a lot of rappelling and wanted to get a personal harness for relatively not a lot of money. I found this harness and gave it a try. Great Harness that feels secure and balanced. Also very comfortable. I highly recommend this harness!
customer_reviews.author: Maritimer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Harness for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality item that can be adjusted for a wide range of body sizes. We've used it for small children as young as 6, to nearly adult sized teenagers and it works great. It can take a little time to make all the necessary adjustments over such a wide range of body sizes, but to me that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: To me the best solution to treestand bow hunting
customer_reviews.text: I have been a believer in safety harnesses for bow hunting for many years. I don't like the thought of suspension trauma so I ditched my 4 point harness that attached in the back to this Vario Speed Harness. It is way more comfortable to hang from and being able to grab a hold of the tether line is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Litmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness, Fast and simple to use for men and women
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spare harness to have around in case your climbing buddy doesn't have one, or if you're just going for a quick climb. I wouldn't recommend this for more that a few hours or a long climb as there isn't any padding...
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Work Harness
customer_reviews.text: Excellent harness. Used it all weekend on a 12/12 roof job. Cannot wait to actually have time to rappel. Nice fit and performance with good balance. Comfortable and easy to wear and work with all day. Unobtrusive making work effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Lakehouse

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong , but comfortable at the same time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Average buyer user

customer_reviews.title: Customer
customer_reviews.text: this is a basic harness, we use them for scouting, confined rock wall climbing, rappelling, etc. They are great, quick off, quick on. Use would be limited to a few hours a day, not an all day climb.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5/5 for some side clips but this model does not have that. Overall it's a great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so grand....
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed. Either on amazon other BD website there is no kn weight listing. The harness is nice but be aware in the instructions included it states it's rated for someone under 250lbs. Maybe a nice back up harness but that's about it. Because BD is made in China and not UIAA rated and limited info on the website I will no longer purchase BD products. Just want people aware of this on this particular harness.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for a canyon harness. Ok for gym too.
customer_reviews.author: Andy'mon

customer_reviews.title: :D
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Very fast shipping and a great climbing harness
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok so, far
customer_reviews.text: I like the belt it fits me nice to bad I got it for my nephew. I hope it fits him as good , he being only 9 . So it's not been used yet but I'll write more after.
customer_reviews.author: Victwisted

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and easy to put on in the dark for hunting. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: and easily adjustable waist band and leg bands
customer_reviews.text: I know that this harness is for climbing, but as a contractor im constantly looking for products that make the job easier. This harness was bought to use as a roofing harness on a very steep barn roof, and worked perfectly. Also the harness is clearly well built, with robust buckles, extra stitching, and easily adjustable waist band and leg bands. this harness lives up to the hopes and expectations i had. I put this harness through grueling paces and it worked flawlessly. Im approximately 160lbs and 6' tall, my father however is more in the range of 200-220 and about 5'-10'' he felt very comfortable in this harness! I would recommend buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: jake

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Vario Speed Harness
product_meta.description: DECENT FEATURES of the Black Diamond Vario Speed All-Around Harness Large quick-adjust buckle on waist belt is pre-threaded and doesn't require doubling back Quick-adjust leg loops Constructed from wide nylon webbing Also recommended for gym use The SPECS Type: Unisex Waist: 23-42" / 58-107 cm Legs: 17-28" / 43-71 cm Weight: 15.9 oz / 450 g Material: Nylon webbing ALL CLIMBING SALES ARE FINAL.
feature_bullets: Color coordinated webbing for ease of use while putting on
Large quick-adjust buckle on waist belt is pre-threaded and doesn’t require doubling back
